https://tmrev.io/movie/422198-Boiled Angels: The Trial of Mike Diana 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/tCGVu9Ti30fYQ0LFwrIGmMP80Gb.jpg Florida, 1994. Artist Mike Diana is convicted on an obscenity charge in the wake of an undercover police officer purchasing his limited edition zine Boiled Angel. Here is the very unusual story of what led to this First Amendment debacle happening for the first time in the United States. Boiled Angels: The Trial of Mike Diana
